mapper.insert:
select sq_matches.nextval from dual
INSERT INTO basketball_matches(id,created_on,modified_on,match_id,date_time,away_team_id,final_score,home_team_id,home_team_points,away_team_points,season_year) values(#{id},current_timestamp,current_timestamp,#{matchId},#{dateTime},#{awayTeam.teamId},#{finalScore},#{homeTeam.teamId},#{homeTeamPoints},#{awayTeamPoints},#{seasonYear})
mapper.select: select m.*, th.id as home_id,th.team_id as home_team_id,th.name as home_team_name, ta.id as away_id,ta.team_id as away_team_id,ta.name as away_team_name from basketball_matches m inner join basketball_teams th on (m.home_team_id=th.team_id) inner join basketball_teams ta on (m.away_team_id=ta.team_id) where m.match_id=#{matchId}

select m.*, th.id as home_id,th.team_id as home_team_id,th.name as home_team_name, ta.id as away_id,ta.team_id as away_team_id,ta.name as away_team_name from basketball_matches m inner join basketball_teams th on (m.home_team_id=th.team_id) inner join basketball_teams ta on (m.away_team_id=ta.team_id) where m.id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE basketball_matches set away_team_id=#{awayTeam.teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, home_team_id=#{homeTeam.teamId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modified_on=current_timestamp, date_time=#{dateTime}, final_score=#{finalScore}, home_team_points=#{homeTeamPoints}, away_team_points=#{awayTeamPoints} where match_id=#{matchId}
